org.jhotdraw.app.action.edit
Class PasteAction

java.lang.Object
  javax.swing.AbstractAction
      org.jhotdraw.app.action.edit.AbstractSelectionAction
          org.jhotdraw.app.action.edit.PasteAction
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.ActionListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.Action
public class PasteAction
extends AbstractSelectionAction

Pastes the contents of the system clipboard at the caret position.

This action acts on the last EditableComponent / JTextComponent which had the focus when the ActionEvent was generated.

This action is called when the user selects the Paste item in the Edit menu. The menu item is automatically created by the application.

If you want this behavior in your application, you have to create an action with this ID and put it in your ApplicationModel in method ApplicationModel.initApplication(org.jhotdraw.app.Application).

Version:

Werner Randelshofer
